attributes.action: abolish plans for Council Tax Inspectors to enter our homes and revalue them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Just because a house has a high value does not mean that the owner is wealthy.  Why should the owner be penalised for having a new kitchen, or a conservatory or for being close to schools and shops? Sign this petition to show the government how you feel about this plan.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/revaluation/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
